trans-unit.source: Provides a method that when implemented, resolves a latitude/longitude location to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: 구현할 경우 위도/경도 위치를 도심 주소로 확인하는 메서드를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: To resolve a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> to a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> asynchronously, implement <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>, and provide the civic address data to the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 해결 하려면는 <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> 에 <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> 비동기적으로 구현 <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>, 도시 주소 데이터를 제공 하 고는 <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
Resolves a <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to a civic address synchronously.
The following example shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 호출 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다. <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
Initiates a request to resolve a latitude/longitude location to an address.
trans-unit.target: 위도/경도 위치를 주소로 확인하는 요청을 시작합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 호출 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다. <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous request using <see cref="M:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)" /> to resolve a latitude/longitude to a civic address is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)" />를 사용하여 위도/경도를 도심 주소로 확인하는 비동기 요청이 완료될 때 발생합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> and handle the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 호출 하는 방법을 <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> 처리는 <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> 이벤트입니다.
